comprehensive_overview: FragGeneScan is a gene-finding program specifically designed for short reads from next-generation sequencing (NGS) technology. It predicts protein-coding sequences in short DNA sequences such as metagenomic and single-cell sequencing data.

core_features.2: Designed for short reads from NGS technology
core_features.3: Particularly useful for metagenomic and single-cell sequencing data
core_features.4: Supports both metagenomic and whole genome sequencing data
